divs: sighting detailsdecember,2010 to april,2011 i was in my back yard looking at the stars rite above the mountains and i noticed one sparkling.i thought the light was a very far off plane or chopper until it went up as far up as it did. it moved very slowly straight up, it caught my attention. i then saw another sparkling light in the same area as the first do the same thing. the lights were very far away and the light from them was very faint. i was not sure what they were so i went and grabbed my daughters camera. i started taking video and snapshots, and until 4\28\11 i really did not know how to work the camera. i caught some pretty interesting photos. you tell me what these are! i

Summary: Noticed moving star and took photos
